reviews.name: Yogi Bear (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: I took my 3 year old nephew to the theater to see this movie. He stayed through the whole movie which was something I wasn't expecting. There was nothing "scary" in the movie. Even with Disney and Pixar movies there's usually a scary villian, but in this movie there was just a jerky guy who was the villian. Another good thing was there are no annoying songs to get stuck in your head, so watching it over and over wouldn't be too painful. I think I'm going to order this for my nephew's 4th birthday:)
reviews.title: Perfect for little ones

reviews.name: Yogi Bear (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Yogi Bear is a simple story. They didn't mess with that. The story is he's a bear that wants people's pic-nic baskets. They didn't make him pop and cool. They just told his story. I loved it. It made me think of my childhood. I also liked the mix of animation and live-action. It was done extremely well. And very realistic.
reviews.title: Very Simple and Perfect

reviews.name: Yogi Bear (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: This movie is fun,enjoyableand good for the family.
reviews.title: 06 April 2011

reviews.name: Yogi Bear (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: IT WAS VERY TRUE TO THE ORGINAL CARTOON. IT WAS A PLESURE TO WATCH THIS WITH MY GRANDKIDS, WOULD RECOMMENDE THIS MOVIE FOR ALL AGES.
reviews.title: True to it's namesake

reviews.name: Yogi Bear (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my friend's sons birthday gift and he was ecstatic great price shipped quickly and was a hit would recommend this to others
reviews.title: I bought this for a friend's son
